name: Generic Zombie FPS
description:
Bit of a fun side project, nothing serious. Just a mini zombie-killing game with some friendly AI to help you out.

It's based on a tutorial series on Udemy, though I expanded it and fixed some bugs that were present in the course. 

There's a few weapon types you can pick up from the ground using E. You can only have 2 equipped at a time, use the '1' and '2' keys to switch between them. Although it shows your max ammo it never goes down, removed that feature but forgot to remove the UI element. 

Only download if you literally want something to waste 2 minutes of your life with :D
